name: LD 45: Venture
description:
Your ex-girlfriend’s cousin’s uncle happens to be able to get you a meeting at a venture capital firm! You possess nothing but an expert command of tech buzzwords. How much investment could you coax out of the VC?

Controls:

  • Up/Down (or W/S): Choose who to talk to
  • Left/Right (or A/D): Choose what to talk about
  • Tap Space (or J, Left Mouse Click) at the right time to yell out some buzzword

If you have enjoyed this game, feel free to hit me up on Twitter. I'd love to connect!
